name: Syntax (thetego)
description:
_____________________ WARNING! This game still-in-development if you have any problem type "restart" to the terminal. You have limited code rights, If you want to try weird stuff type "god" to the terminal, It will give you unlimited code right. If you don't understand anything watch the gameplay video! We know there are so many bugs but we only have 3 days so... _____________________ Main Theme

Syntax is a 3D puzzle game but you have to write some codes to the terminal for passing the levels.

The game includes 10 levels right now. On each level, AI called "J.E.N.N.A" helps you. She is your friend trust her.  Her voice was made in Replica AI. 

In-game there are two monitors which include your menu, terminal, settings, and J.EN.N.A.  I said you have to write some codes but they are limited on each level, you have to use them right or you should restart the level.

Documentation

There is documentation in-game too but here are the codes you can write:

'''//to look the index move the mouse cursor over the object

value = {true,false}
range = {destination point} //you can enter any number

door_index_value //index indicates the door on scene
box_index_position_x_z //x & z indicates position of platform

elevator_index_level_range //index indicates the elevator on scene

restart //restarts the level'''

Our Team

We didn't use any assets except the voice of J.E.N.N.A . All the 3D Models, animations, scripts made by our team, Opulence Interactive. Here our team members:

-Muratcan İnaltekin (Lead Developer)

-Ömer Oğuz Çelik (Developer)

-Ahmet Eren Oğuz (3D Artist)

-Deniz Şeker (3D Artist)

-Ömer Salih Sarı (2D Artist & Level Designer)

and our musician Mert Erdoğan.  Also, check our website!

Made for Atom Game Jam #2 !

Don't forget to write your comments below. have_0_fun!

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1AzfLHEUQOvKM8OXhkicSVgG_CK2X-66Y/view?usp=shari... (IL2CPP Version)
